title: Trigger Down Pro v1.0.1 Mod (All Levels & Weapons Unlocked)
description:
You are an elite shooter and in a mission for Anti-Terror Fight. Pull the Trigger down and shoot your enemies to death. Explore different cities and enemy territories to eliminate the terror from the world.

Take to the frontline against enemy soldiers in this war zone.
If you love shooting games like FRONTLINE COMMANDO and Dead City, you will not miss this hard hitting action game.

Features:

*ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK and amazing background music.
*COOL and Smooth game control.
*UNLOCK new achievements to challenge your friends on leader board.
*UPGRADE new weapons in deadly modern combat.
*ADDICTIVE armor power-ups that will keep you engage.
*ONLINE leader boards with a new ranking system.
*SHARE on facebook and Google plus.

How to Play:

Touch right below button to fire.
Touch the upper button to reload your weapon.

This new PRO version shooting game of war is for all fans of action games, FPS games (First-Person Shooters), online FPS games, war games, multiplayer games and for all players who want to dominate the battlefield!

Upgrade lethal weapons to achieve Medal of Honor.
Get ready for a whole new Counter Strike experience!

More info: (Credits to acer-a500)
